item.title: Command-Line Syntax Key
item.description: The following table describes the notation used to indicate command-line syntax. Notation Description Loose Text Required text that must be typed as shown. < … > Placeholder for a required value. [ … ] Set of optional items. { … } Set of required items. You must choose one. | (pipe) Pipe separator for mutually exclusive items. ... (ellipsis) Items that can be repeated and used multiple times.
item.dc:creator: Michael Ryan
